events.message: I received the wrong size of the jacket I ordered and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's message indicated a refund request due to incorrect product sizing received.
The case has been assigned to Customer Support Agent Sarah T. for resolution and refund processing.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your jacket size. Iâ€™m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unopened and in original condition for the refund?
My order number is 458792, and I have not worn the jacket yet. It is still in the original packaging and tags.
Thank you for confirming. We will initiate the refund right away once you ship back the jacket. I will send you the prepaid return label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and assistance. I appreciate the prepaid label for the return parcel.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you received your refund and that everything is resolved to your satisfaction.
We are closing this case now but feel free to contact us again if you have any further questions or issues.
